page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
At Towerbank Primary School we carried out a survey of the pupils between 9 and 11 to find out the{most popular {playground games.}The six most popular games were:
1.{Football. 2.{"Helpy"}_ one person goes "he" and as he catches people they also become "he" and help him to catch the people left. 3.{Hide and Seek}_ everybody hides and one person has to find them. 4.{"Dodgy"}_ this is played with a ball and if it hits you then you are out. Last man out is the winner. 5.{Tig}_ one person goes "he" and he tries to catch someone else to make him "he" in his place. 6.{British Bulldogs}_ a group of people must get past one person or more.
